It's very auspicious.
In the south, there's the star Cūḍa.

source_sentence: 是東方最勝世界運意通證如來佛。
translation: It's the Tathāgata Buddha who fully realizes the will of the Eastern paramount world.
In the south, there's the star Juomen.

source_sentence: 是東方妙寶世界光音自在如來佛。
translation: It's the Tathāgata Buddha of the Eastern World of Exquisite Jewels who is Freely Powerful in Sound of Light.
Homage to the Star of Rucun.

source_sentence: 是東方圓滿世界金色成就如來佛。
translation: This is the Tathāgata Buddha of Golden Fulfillment in the Eastern Perfect World.
Homage to the star Wenqu.

source_sentence: 是東方無憂世界最勝吉祥如來佛。
translation: It's the Most Excellent Auspicious Tathāgata Buddha of the Eastern Saúl-Free World.
Homage to the star Lianzheng.

source_sentence: 是東方淨住世界廣達智辨如來佛。
translation: This is the Tathāgata Buddha of vastly advanced wisdom and discernment from the Pure Land in the east.
*Wuqu Xing in the south.

source_sentence: 是東方法意世界法海遊戲如來佛。
translation: This is the Tathāgata Buddha who plays in the Dharma ocean in the eastern world of Dharmas and intentions.
*Mahāmegha star in the south.

source_sentence: 是東方琉璃世界藥師琉璃光如來佛。
translation: This is the Tathāgata Buddha of Lapis Light, the Medicine Buddha of the Eastern Lapis World.

source_sentence: 若遇行年災厄禮此經七拜。
translation: If he encounters a year of traveling disasters or difficulties, he pays homage to this sūtra seven times.

source_sentence: 爾時佛告文殊師利菩薩。
translation: It was then that the Buddha told Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva.
"This is the sūtra that's being taught.
"It has great authority and great power.

source_sentence: 能救一切眾生重罪能滅一切業障。
translation: It can save all sentient beings from serious crimes and extinguish all karmic hindrances.
Suppose there are monks, nuns, and bhikṣus.

source_sentence: 宰官居士善男子善女人。
translation: government officials, householders, good men, and good women.
Whether noble, humble, or large or small, their lives are all covered by the seven stars of the Big Dipper.
They all fall under the jurisdiction of the seven stars of the Big Dipper.

source_sentence: 若聞此經受持供養轉讀。
translation: If he hears this sūtra, he'll accept it, make offerings, and read it again.

source_sentence: 勸於朋友親族骨肉受持者現世獲福後世得生天上。
translation: They encourage their friends, relatives, bones, and flesh to uphold it, and it will bring merit in the present life and birth in the heavens in the latter life.
Suppose good men and good women.
If someone has died before, they'll fall into hell.
They may experience various kinds of pain and suffering.
If he hears this sūtra and makes offerings with faith and respect, then he'll be freed from hell for those who died before him.
They'll then escape hell when they die before their time and be born in the paradise world.

source_sentence: 生於極樂世界　若有善男子善女人。
translation: He'll be born in the paradise world. Suppose there are good sons and good women who are attacked by ghosts and evil demons.

source_sentence: 或被鬼魅所侵邪魔所嬈。
translation: Sometimes they're attacked by ghosts and demons, or they're haunted by evil demons.
They have nightmares, strange dreams, and frightening spirits.
If they hear this sūtra and memorize and make offerings to it.
They'll then attain peace of soul and spirit.

source_sentence: 永無恐怖　若善男子善女人。
translation: He'll never be afraid. Suppose good sons and good women are employed, serving, and well motivated.

source_sentence: 或有仕官身役善發征行。
translation: Perhaps they have an official or body servant who's well motivated to pursue their occupation.
If they meet this sūtra, they'll believe it, honor it, and make offerings to it.

source_sentence: 即得仕官高遷甚大吉　若善男子善女人。
translation: He'll be promoted to a higher rank and become very fortunate! If good sons and good women are sick, they'll be able to work hard.
Perhaps their body is tormented by illness.
They want to get off lightly.

source_sentence: 當於淨室燒香供養此經。
translation: They must burn incense in a clean room and make offerings to this sūtra.

source_sentence: 疾病痊瘥　若善男子善女人。
translation: He'll be cured of his illness. If good sons and good women want to get ahead and travel as brokers.

source_sentence: 欲得進達及以出行經紀。
translation: They want to get ahead and travel as an agent.
They seek wealth and success, and then they'll produce goods for sale.
If he meets this sūtra and makes offerings with faith and respect, then he'll be able to seek wealth and fame and travel to and from the great land.

source_sentence: 即得求財稱遂出入大吉。
translation: He'll then seek wealth and fame and be able to travel in and out of great fortune.
"Suppose there are good men and good women who want to get ahead and travel as brokers.
Perhaps they raise silkworm and waste it, and their six animals become restless.

source_sentence: 即於淨室燒香供養此經。
translation: They burn incense in a clean room and make offerings to this sūtra.

source_sentence: 即得田蠶遂意六畜孳榮。
translation: The silkworm will then grow in the fields, and the six animals will flourish.

source_sentence: 永無損失亦無災障　若有女人懷胎難月。
translation: There's no loss or damage, and there are no hindrances. If there's a woman who's having a difficult month in pregnancy, she can make offerings to this sutra.
If she meets this sūtra and makes offerings with faith and respect, then her mother and child will be freed from the misfortune and hardship that afflicts them.

source_sentence: 即一得母子分解厄難消除。
translation: She'll attain the dissolution of mother and child, and her troubles and difficulties will be eliminated.
The resulting son or daughter will then attain the fruit of a long and correct life.

source_sentence: 皆得端正長命果報　若善男子善女人。
translation: They'll all attain the fruit of a correct, long life. If good sons and good women.

source_sentence: 須知北斗七星管人生命。
translation: You should know that the seven stars of the Big Dipper govern human life.
In their lifetime, they'll be exposed to all kinds of misfortune and trouble.
Officials, mouths, and kettles blare a hundred strange things.
If they encounter this sūtra, they'll faithfully venerate it and make offerings to it.

source_sentence: 一無妨害　爾時文殊師利言善男子善女人恭敬信受作禮而散。
translation: None of them will harm him. At that point, Mañjuśrī said, "Good men and good women, respectfully accept it with faith, make obeisance, and disperse.
The Buddha's Explanation of the Seven Stars of the Big Dipper's Prolonged Life Sutra
(Under the Thin Caojue xvii Benli.
This sūtra is cited.

source_sentence: 今年幸得栂尾山法鼓臺傳習之本於洛北福勝密寺。
translation: This year, I was fortunate to obtain the text transmitted from the Dharma Drum Tower on Mt. Tsugao at the Fusheng Miji Temple in northern Luo.
He bestowed a copy of the national sūtra on the founder.

source_sentence: 于時享和二歲次壬戌紀號仲夏月沙門快道記豐山小池坊輪下總持院　　一挍加筆訖慈順)。
translation: At the time of the second year of the henghe era, the mid-summer month of the calendar year nonsuch, the monk Kondoji, the chief administrator of the monastery at Koike Place, Toyama, and the director of the monastery's office, I took notes and compiled them for Cisun.)
